phrases: dou ka please can you keep my se cret?
mu ga mu chuu da that is all right
Please, please can you keep my secret?
The mirror, shining so brilliantly.
I wonder how do I look in it.
The future, beckoning me forward.
What will happen from now, I wonder?
Because what we see is not everything.
I am losing myself but that is all right.
I will now try not to waver.
I want to be true to my heart.
But even I have a secret or two.
That I want to keep to myself.
That is why my secret makes my heart aches slightly.
We will surely meet again
Everything that is reflected by your eyes,
is it all just an illusion?
I wonder how you feel,
as you melt away in this entangling love
Take a look at the reason we are joined together
Let us cling on to each other from our sadness
Is not it fine just like that?
It will be an unadorned beauty
Let us understand this, someday...
That no matter where we are,
we will surely meet again
Melting things away with Latte Magic
Melting things away with Latte Magic
To Hinata
Magical Maids!
Hot tea
Hot tea
Magical Girls Day
Quenelles, Spoon, and um...
Preview
Hinata, Misaki and Usui
Hinata, Misaki and Usui
Is last month's financial report done?
Also, confirm the location for the next major cleanup-
Misaki-chan!
What business do you have here?
Let us play!
This is not an amusement park!
Why is Takumi here already?!
And you!
How many times do I have to tell you?!
Well, it is relaxing here...
Go to the library if you want to read!
The student council room is not a place for fun!
I often see him hanging around her recently...
Who is he?
Ah, you mean Shintani?
I heard he was her childhood friend.
She took care of him when they were kids.
I thought I saw dogs glaring at each other just now...
What are you saying?
Pets are not allowed in school!
You are imagining things.
No, that is not what I mean...
As I thought, she is an amazing person!
I am hungry.
Hinata, do you still have any bread crusts?
Bread crusts taste surprisingly good!
Give me some, too!
So you guys finally realised how great bread crusts truly are?!
How many times must I tell you to abstain from eating in class?
Misaki-chan, do you want some, too?
No thanks!
Hey, what about that, have you told her?
Oh, the part time job?
P-Part time job?!
So Misaki-chan is Misa-chan?!
This is where you are working part time?!
What'bout the part time job?
Oh, he started working at a petrol station.
Oh, that.
Do not worry.
I am not going to tell anyone about your job.
What is the hush-hush over there?
It is nothing!
Ok, I need to leave for my job!
So, give us the dirt.
How is things between you two?
You guys did not have much chance to converse properly at outdoor education.
Though, it seemed like you guys got closer after that!
Do not tell me...
Did something happen between you and him?
Nothing happened!
He is just my childhood friend!
Night arrives...
I am back!
I am so hungry!
Oh yeah, I forgot to call him
Hey grandpa!
Hinata here-
HEY!
What were you thinking?!
You did not even call us, Hinata!
You do not need to be that angry...
Granny's worried sick, too!
I am doing fine here!
You do not need to worry about me!
I am glad I came here!
Did you manage to find her?
Yeah.
I found her almost immediately.
She is at the same school, even the same class, as me!
This... must be fate, right?
An anime-cosplay event?
Yeah!
The producers gave us permission to do it after seeing our pictures!
Especially you!
You are just perfect for Rose!
Magical Maids...
You have not watched it yet?
It is airing on Sunday mornings.
There is no one else that can play Mimosa but me!
You do not need to!
Anyway, take this!
I will lend you these DVDs, so try to get into the role of your character.
There is this much?!
It is the 4th season already.
There is about 40 volumes in this season alone.
You do not need to watch them all.
Just watch episode 1,
And episode 12 and 13.
Also, this volume's pretty popular as well, so I recommend this!
That aside, what happened after Hinata found out about your secret?
I do not know if I can answer that...
Did Usui become jealous?
Speaking of Usui, he is not here today.
I did not see him in the kitchen.
Does not matter!
He is just a perverted alien!
Thank you very much!
Shintani!
You can leave now!
Okay!
Remember to tell me what shift you want next month!
Sorry but...
I might need to attend supplementary classes...
What?!
You are having problems with your studies?
You gave me a shoulder massage, so shall I tutor you?
It will not really help much.
What are you saying, you idiot?!
Need a ride back?
I have an extra helmet.
It is fine, I need to make a stop today.
Strange...
I am sure it was somewhere around here...
This persimmon looks yummy!
Wait!
Be good and do not roll away!
Oh my!
I want to dance in the summer!
Oh no!
Master's been cursed with black magic and made to dance!
Let us go, Lily!
Got it!
Mop Missiles!
Kids shows nowadays are rather... amazing, are not they?
Mop missiles, huh...
There is also rag bombs...
Ah, Mom's back.
Ah, there is a man I have never seen before.
No, this is...
Maybe he will be our new father?
Suzuna-chan!
You have gotten so big!
You were so tiny back then!
Let us go, Hamburger-kun!
I was waiting for that, Cheese-chan!
Super Mega Cheese Hamburger!
What the hell was that?
It is a part from an anime we watched together!
I know that, but still...
This will not do.
You do not look tasty at all.
You were much bigger and juicier last time.
Eh?!
What should I do then?
We will lose to Tsukimi Burger-kun like this, right, Sis?
What should I do, Misaki-chan?!
Do not ask me!
Why are you here?!
He picked up some persimmons I dropped.
We met by pure coincidence.
Here, this too!
Thank you!
Wait, did not this happen before...?
Thank you for the meal!
You have gotten a lot handsomer, Hinata.
Am I manlier, too?
Yes!
You have grown sturdy.
You still have that habit of eating persimmons you have picked up, though.
Well, I did not know it was you who dropped them!
So, what were you doing near my house?
Ah, I was looking for something.
You-kun, do not tell me that you still like Sis?
Suzuna!
What was that for?!
W-What do you mean by that?!
You-kun's still as easy to read as he was back then.
Back then?!
No way!
I was shy and kept a low profile!
No one should have known!
Yeah...
You kept staring at Misaki-chan.
Even you knew about it?!
You were looking for our house, right?
You should not stalk people, you know?
No, that is not it.
I was looking for the cherry tree.
I thought it might still be there.
Cherry tree?
You mean the one you fell from that one time?
Oh!
You remembered?!
Hey!
It is dangerous!
You-kun!
Are you okay?!
I am fine.
Geez, you are such a troublemaker, You-kun!
Do not go climbing trees again, and make sure to follow me, okay?
I got it, Misaki-chan.
I promise.
I will follow you for life, Misaki-chan!
You-kun!
That is not right!
That part happened in the hospital, did not it?
You remember it that well...
I got it, Misaki-chan.
I promise to follow you for life, Misaki-chan!
Also, that is not what I meant by follow me!
But, no matter where it happened, the promise was real!
This drink tastes rather nice.
I wonder if that cherry tree is still there...
It is finally Sunday!
Of course, we will spend our time here today!
I am looking forward to today's event!
I have done my research since Ikkun told us about it!
Me too!
It was my first time watching early morning shoujo anime!
Get ready to be melted away by today's Latte Magic!
Oh no!
Master's been cursed with black magic!
This is where Misa...
No, Rose shows up!
Let us go, Lily!
Got it!
Kariron Popuron Instant Cure!
With this, you will be fine!
Take your time and enjoy!
That was a perfect Magical Maids cosplay!
The similarity to the original is just amazing!
I only watched it once, but I liked it!
Especially the two main characters.
It is just as you predicted!
But I did not expect Misa-chan to do this much for us!
I thought she was going to ignore us again...
That is fine by me, though.
That error you made when calling her name is unforgivable!
Do you know that?!
I got it...
We are going to make today's event a complete success!
Satsuki, I am just perfect for Mimosa's character, are not I?
No.
You are a boy in middle school, Aoi-kun!
I will not let you go out to the floor.
Even when I am this suitable for the role?
An extra order, a Witch Parfait!
No-nam-cha-ruru-tte!
Mam-pu-kan!
Why the diet spell?
Though I answered you instinctively...
You even remembered the core spells that are never really used?
You did not even know anything about this before...
I watched all of the DVDs.
All of them?
It took a lot of time, though.
I spent all of last night finishing them up.
You even pulled an all-nighter for this?!
Huh?
He is coming today as a customer...
I thought he was already a part of the staff...
What are you going to do?
Are you going to do the magic girl routine in front of him?
Melt away with Latte Magic today!
He seems different today...
Normally, he would have replied smugly...
So he really is bothered by Hinata...
I do not really get it, but it is time for Mimosa to-
You stay here.
Sorry for the wait!
Sorry for the wait, miladies!
How was today's special, the Magical Miracle Parfait?
I enjoyed it.
It was miraculous.
Do you really mean that?
The girls in the kitchen wanted to hear your opinion.
Use a pointed spoon when putting the quenelles on top.
I am sure they will get better with some practice.
Quene- Pointed spoon, right?
For this parfait, the frills around the rose decoration was nicely done.
However, I think the sponge cake inside should be a little firmer...
That is quite a lot of opinions you have there...
Shall I write them down on a memo?
Really, just who are you, Usui?
You are not just another ordinary guy, that I know.
I will take that as a compliment.
A certain someone has been calling me this,
so just think of me as another perverted alien.
Misaki-chan!
I have come to play!
Shintani!
Why are you here?!
Rather, you knew about Misa-chan working here?!
Oh, you guys are here to see her as well?
You are wrong!!
It is not Misaki-chan, but Misa-chan!
That is the law here in Maid Latte!
You are here too, eh?
Today's event is not an all-you-can-eat.
Are you fine with that?
So that is Hinata...
It is getting interesting, is not it?
It is all that dimwit's fault.
You two, chill out!
Oh yeah!
Time to use the patch-up spell!
Ukinpa, Wakunpa, Let us be friends!
Huh?
That is not strong enough!
They need some of Mimosa's Boys Love Spell-
You are not allowed to go out, Aoi.
Sorry for the wait!
It is the Magical Russian Roulette!
I have been waiting for this!
This is the special event today!
Okay, one of these contains a magical juice.
The one who drinks it has to put on a straight face, and I have to guess who drank it.
If you beat me, you can choose either a specially-made coaster, or a commemoration photo-
The photo, of course!
Okay, I got it.
I will cast a spell right now.
Do not hold back on me,'kay?
Wait, what kind of spell?
A spell that renders you incapable of lying
Dorinpa Dorunpa!
Now you cannot lie!
What is wrong?!
Get hold of yourself!
T-This juice is... no joke.
The one who drank the magical juice is Master Kurotatsu!
Never mind, give me some water...!
Kurotatsu!
Have a safe journey, masters!
Let us just pull back for today!
W-Water...
Kurotatsu!!
W-Water...
That looks interesting!
I want to try it, too!
What spell would you like, master?
How about... a spell to beat my rival?
It is pointless to beat me by magic.
He is got a point!
You got to win it by yourself!
Besides, the love spell is a double-edged sword.
Even if it succeeds, there will be a price to pay.
Stop!
I do not like scary stories!
I am shivering just from listening to the scary consequences!
No one said anything about them...
Thanks for the meal.
What is wrong?
No...
Have a safe trip, master.
Have a safe trip, master!
Misa-chan!
I have got a spell that I would like you to cast on me.
A Seeking spell!
Seeking spell?
You know, that cherry tree!
Hurry, cast on me!
I will cast it, then.
Derunpa Deronpa!
You will find it soon!
Aoi seems moody.
He is pouting about not being to get out to the floor.
I helped you with the outfits!
Yeah, yeah.
I even helped you with the acting!
Yeah, yeah.
I looked so cute as Mimosa, too!
You just butted in forcefully.
I wanted to show off on the floor!
Enough of that!
Anyway, why are you alone here on a holiday?
Go make some friends to play with!
Why do I have to be lectured by you?!
This place is not a playground.
Shut up!
It does not matter to you whether I have friends or not!
I am not the only one who is alone!
Usui's alone all the time!
Do not say that!
I am sure he does not have any friends at all!
That is not true, right, Misa?
Ah, his friends?
Um...
Is Yukimura his friend?
No, more like a pet.
Is Kanou his friend...?
How about you?
What are you to him?
Geez, is not that obvious enough?
Just friends?
No...
It does not feel like that...
Rivals?
I thought so at first, but I am not sure he thinks we are...
Thought?
You used past tense just now.
Let me change my question.
What is he to you now?
What is he to me now...?
W-Why are you here?!
Is that wrong?
Yes!
It is suspicious to hang out around here at this hour!
You would be taken as a pervert!
What are you thinking, you idiot?!
W-Why are you laughing?
It is funny to see a magical girl taking out the trash.
Is not there a spell for that?
Try casting another spell, like just now!
Your face's really red, Ayuzawa.
Shut up!
Tonight's rather cold...
Do not you feel cold?
Wear a coat if you are going to be out at this hour!
You sure like to worry about others, eh?
Is that wrong?!
I planned to walk home just like this, but I felt like seeing you.
Do not you have friends?
Do I look that solitary to you?
Do not tell me you heard what we said just now-
Speaking of that, I am curious.
About that last question- I want to know the answer.
Just what am I to you now?
Shut up!
I see.
So this is what you do when you cannot lie.
Really, you are not honest with yourself.
Shut up!
It is embarrassing, you know?!
How terrible of you.
Just shut up already!
I will show you what my feelings are, then.
What are you doing?!
Let me go!
Stop it, you sexual harassing alien!
If someone sees us like this-!
Dorinpa, Dorunpa
Now you cannot lie.
I want you to tell me the truth.
You are not even a magical girl...
How can you use spells?
As I thought, Misaki-chan is...
No!
It has nothing to do with him!
It is here!
I found it!
I am glad that it is still here.
It is grown quite a bit, too.
This... must be fate.
The event in Maid Latte this time was a bang!
I was even knocked out by the magical juice!
This is truly a fearsome heart-shocking event!
Heart Attack!
I do not know what you guys are saying, but never mind.
Misaki-chan!
Ah!
Misaki Misaki!
Misaki!
Misa-chan!
What is wrong?!
Why is everyone calling for me?!
I just wanted to circle around you!
There is a UxMishi live performance at the Cultural Festival!
Have not you learnt your lesson yet?
I just wanted to call your name.
Just what do you want me to do?!
